00026 // Constructor
00027 IPXactModel::IPXactModel(QDomDocument document, QObject *parent):
00028                                                                         QAbstractItemModel(parent), IPXactDoc_(document) {
00029 
00030         // create the root item
00031         rootItem_ = QSharedPointer<IPXactItem>(new IPXactItem(IPXactDoc_, 0));
00032 }

00038 // get the parents model index
00039 QModelIndex IPXactModel::parent(const QModelIndex &child) const {
00040         // if the parameter is invalid, an invalid model index is returned
00041         if (!child.isValid()) {
00042                 return QModelIndex();
00043         }
00044 
00045         // pointer to the child item
00046         IPXactItem *childItem = static_cast<IPXactItem*>(child.internalPointer());
00047         IPXactItem *parent = childItem->parent();
00048 
00049         // if the parent is invalid or is root then invalid model index is returned
00050         if (!parent || parent == rootItem_) {
00051                 return QModelIndex();
00052         }
00053 
00054         // create new index for the parent and return it
00055         return createIndex(parent->row(), 0, parent);
00056 }

00058 // get the data from the identified item
00059 QVariant IPXactModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const {
00060         // if given index is invalid then invalid data is returned
00061         if (!index.isValid()) {
00062                 return QVariant();
00063         }
00064 
00065         // valid data is returned only for supported roles
00066         if ((role == Qt::DisplayRole) || (role == Qt::EditRole)) {
00067 
00068                 // get the pointer to the item
00069                 IPXactItem *item = static_cast<IPXactItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00070 
00071                 // get the node owned by the item
00072                 QDomNode *node = item->node();
00073 
00074                 // get list of the attributes for the node
00075                 QStringList attributes;
00076                 QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = node->attributes();
00077 
00078                 // the data to be showed is determined by the column of the item
00079                 switch (index.column()) {
00080                 // first column shows the name of the element
00081                 case 0:
00082                         return node->nodeName();
00083 
00084                         // second column shows the attributes of the element
00085                 case 1:
00086                         for (int i = 0; i < attributeMap.count(); ++i) {
00087                                 QDomNode attribute = attributeMap.item(i);
00088                                 attributes << attribute.nodeName() + "=\""
00089                                                 + attribute.nodeValue() + "\"";
00090                         }
00091                         return attributes.join(" ");
00092 
00093                         // third column shows the values of the elements
00094                 case 2:
00095                         return node->nodeValue().split("\n").join(" ");
00096 
00097                         // no more columns are shown
00098                 default:
00099                         return QVariant();
00100                 }
00101         }
00102         else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole) {
00103                 switch (index.column()) {
00104                 case 0:
00105                         return QObject::tr("Name of the element");
00106                 case 1:
00107                         return QObject::tr("Attributes of the element");
00108                 case 2:
00109                         return QObject::tr("Value of the element");
00110                 default:
00111                         return QVariant();
00112                 }
00113         }
00114         else {
00115                 return QVariant();
00116         }
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool IPXactModel::setData(const QModelIndex &index, const QVariant &value,
00120                 int role) {
00121         // if the index is invalid, nothing is done
00122         if (!index.isValid()) {
00123                 return false;
00124         }
00125 
00126         // the data is edited only for supported roles
00127         if (role != Qt::EditRole) {
00128                 return false;
00129         }
00130 
00131         // get the pointer to the item
00132         IPXactItem *item = static_cast<IPXactItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00133 
00134         // get the node from the wrapper
00135         QDomNode *node = item->node();
00136 
00137         // select which column to edit
00138         switch (index.column()) {
00139         // the element name cannot be edited
00140         case 0:
00141                 return false;
00142                 // the attributes cannot be edited
00143         case 1:
00144                 return false;
00145                 // the value of an element can be modified
00146         case 2:
00147                 // set the new value
00148                 node->setNodeValue(value.toString());
00149                 // emit the signal to inform the change
00150                 emit(dataChanged(index, index));
00151                 return true;
00152         default:
00153                 return false;
00154         }
00155 }

00157 // Return the amount of columns the item has
00158 int IPXactModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex&) const {
00159         return 3;

00162 // Get the headerdata of the given section
00163 QVariant IPXactModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00164                 int role) const {
00165         // valid data is returned for only approved roles
00166         if (((role == Qt::DisplayRole) ||
00167                         (role == Qt::EditRole)) &&
00168                         (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)) {
00169                 switch (section) {
00170                 case 0:
00171                         return tr("Name");
00172                 case 1:
00173                         return tr("Attributes");
00174                 case 2:
00175                         return tr("Value");
00176                 default:
00177                         return QVariant();
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 
00181         // The role was not approved
00182         return QVariant();
00183 }

00185 // get the falgs associated with the item
00186 Qt::ItemFlags IPXactModel::flags(const QModelIndex &index) const {
00187         // is given index is invalid
00188         if (!index.isValid()) {
00189                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled;
00190         }
00191 
00192         if (index.column() != 2) {
00193                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00194         }
00195         else {
00196                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEditable;
00197         }
00198 }

00200 // return numebr of rows located under the identified item
00201 int IPXactModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent) const {
00202         if (parent.column() > 0) {
00203                 return 0;
00204         }
00205 
00206         // get the pointer to the parent
00207         IPXactItem *parentItem = 0;
00208 
00209         // if the given item is invalid it is interpreted as root item
00210         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00211                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00212         }
00213         else {
00214                 parentItem = static_cast<IPXactItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00215         }
00216 
00217         // return the number of the child items (rows) the parent has
00218         return parentItem->node()->childNodes().count();
00219 }

00221 // create an index for the item with the given row, column and parent
00222 QModelIndex IPXactModel::index(int row, int column,
00223                 const QModelIndex & parent) const {
00224 
00225         if (!hasIndex(row, column, parent)) {
00226                 return QModelIndex();
00227         }
00228 
00229         IPXactItem *parentItem;
00230 
00231         // if the index of the parent is invalid then it is the root item
00232         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00233                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00234         }
00235         else {
00236                 parentItem = static_cast<IPXactItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00237         }
00238 
00239         IPXactItem *child = parentItem->child(row);
00240         // if the child exists
00241         if (child) {
00242                 return createIndex(row, column, child);
00243         }
00244         else {
00245                 return QModelIndex();
00246         }
00247 }

00249 // get the VLNV tag of the IP-XACT document
00250 VLNV IPXactModel::getVLNV() {
00251         // first the correct element is searched for by its name
00252         // and then the child of the element (which is the text element that holds
00253         // the value of the element) is added to the struct
00254 
00255         QString temp;
00256 
00257         // get the type of the document
00258         QDomNodeList nodeList = IPXactDoc_.childNodes();
00259         // search for the first element with children
00260         int i = 0;
00261         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00262                 ++i;
00263         }
00264         temp = nodeList.at(i).nodeName();
00265         QTextStream stream(&temp);
00266         stream.skipWhiteSpace();
00267         QString type;
00268         stream >> type;
00269 
00270         // the vendor information
00271         QDomNodeList vendorList = IPXactDoc_.elementsByTagName(VENDOR_);
00272         temp = vendorList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00273         QTextStream stream2(&temp);
00274         stream2.skipWhiteSpace();
00275         QString vendor;
00276         stream2 >> vendor;
00277 
00278         // the library information
00279         QDomNodeList libraryList = IPXactDoc_.elementsByTagName(LIBRARY_);
00280         temp = libraryList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00281         QTextStream stream3(&temp);
00282         stream3.skipWhiteSpace();
00283         QString library;
00284         stream3 >> library;
00285 
00286         // The name information
00287         QDomNodeList nameList = IPXactDoc_.elementsByTagName(NAME_);
00288         temp = nameList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00289         QTextStream stream4(&temp);
00290         stream4.skipWhiteSpace();
00291         QString name;
00292         stream4 >> name;
00293 
00294         // The version information
00295         QDomNodeList versionList = IPXactDoc_.elementsByTagName(VERSION_);
00296         temp = versionList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00297         QTextStream stream5(&temp);
00298         stream5.skipWhiteSpace();
00299         QString version;
00300         stream5 >> version;
00301 
00302         return VLNV(type, vendor, library, name, version);
00303 }
00304 
00305 VLNV::IPXactType IPXactModel::getDocType() const {
00306         QDomNodeList nodeList = IPXactDoc_.childNodes();
00307         int i = 0;
00308 
00309         if (nodeList.isEmpty())
00310                 return VLNV::INVALID;
00311 
00312         // search for the firstelement with children (=document type)
00313         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00314                 ++i;
00315 
00316                 // if theres no nodes left then this was not ip-xact file
00317                 if (i >= nodeList.count())
00318                         return VLNV::INVALID;
00319         }
00320 
00321         // skip possible whitespaces in the file
00322         QString temp = nodeList.at(i).nodeName();
00323         QTextStream stream(&temp);
00324         stream.skipWhiteSpace();
00325         QString type;
00326         stream >> type;
00327 
00328         // return the type without whitespaces
00329         return VLNV::string2Type(type);
00330 }
